title: What The Dub?!
notes: SteamDB shows 86.22% positive (372). Metacritic metascore 78; blended midâ€‘80s. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Players see a short video clip and make up funny captions. The clip is played back with text-to-speech dubbing and best caption gets most points. 12 players using phones as controllers. Shared screen.
